actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, relating to the mailing of absentee ballots cast in elections or referenda free of postage.

summary.text: States that except for mail transmitted under the Federal Voting Assistance Act of 1955 or the Overseas Citizens Voting Rights Act of 1975, any individual casting an absentee ballot in any election may return such ballot postage-free to the agency responsible for such election.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, relating to the mailing of absentee ballots cast in elections or referenda free of postage.
